'''Amethyst Hornblower''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Amethyst married [[Rudibert Bolger]] (born {{SR|1260}}) and was the mother of [[Adalbert Bolger]] ({{SR|1301}}-{{SR|1397|n}}).<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Amethyst|Amethyst]] is named after the gemstone.
